frontmatter.title: Monitoring EntraID with KQL and Azure Alert

node.html: Use Kusto Query Language (KQL) and Azure Alert to monitor resources and send email notifications. By leveraging KQL, you can create custom queries to analyze logs and metrics in Azure Monitor. Azure Alert enables you to set up automated alerts based on these queries, ensuring that you receive timely notifications when specific conditions are met. This approach helps maintain system reliability and enables quick responses to emerging threats.

A personal study project focused on building a streaming media server using Jellyfin. The server is deployed on a low-power Intel processor and utilizes hardware acceleration to optimize media transcoding and streaming performance. This setup allows efficient media management and playback for multiple devices, demonstrating the capabilities of Jellyfin in a home lab.

This project explores the use of Microsoft 365 Business Premium licensing to implement Data Loss Prevention (DLP) with Microsoft Purview. By configuring classification labels and protection rules, sensitive information can be identified, classified, and protected across the organization. DLP policies help prevent accidental data leaks and ensure compliance with regulatory requirements. Implementation involves Microsoft Purview, Exchange Online, SharePoint Online, and OneDrive for Business, providing comprehensive protection for emails, documents, and files.
